for testing purposes
when the sceenreader is off:

  • press 1,2,3 or 4 to select an object in the current chamber
  • press 0 to return to the default position in order to select another object
  • press shift/ctrl + 1,2,3 or 4 to move to a different chamber(1 & 2 for now)
  • press shift/ctrl + left or right to tilt or pan your viewport
  • once you an object is selected, press left or right to rotate around the object
